heading: Planning and Scheduling
content: Diversdesk presents you industry's most flexible planner, offering multi-booking, multi-activity, and cross-location scheduling capabilities. Ensuring smooth operations and satisfied clients.

heading: Paperless Onboarding
content: Operate 100% paperless. Utilize embedded Diver Medical forms and official waivers, or create custom waivers from scratch. Secure, professional, and environmentally friendly.

heading: Secure Customer Database
content: Keep track of past activities and notes for each customer in your secure database, enabling unique insights and easy follow-ups with your clientele.

heading: Staff Calendars and Workload Insights
content: Calendars and workload insights offer a clear view of activity distribution. Schedule off-days and allocate rights per member, optimizing resource use without the need for multiple tools.

heading: Metrics
content: Custom CSV export files, combined with our easy-to-use templates, provide the desired insights into your clientele, Activities, Trips and Cashflow

heading: White Label Functionality
content: Boost your brand's visibility with custom branding on every page and URL you share with customers, ensuring a consistent and professional appearance.
